title: OPEC+ Latest Hike Casts Shadow over Glut Narrative
summary: Last Sunday, OPEC+ agreed to add 137,000 bpd to its collective oil output. This was the seventh monthly output hike decision by the group, and it came amid warnings of a looming supply overhang. Yet oil prices rose on the news.
